ack.title: Contributors
ack.p: CAK, EDC, MLP, and DVH contributed to the study design, data analysis, data interpretation, writing of the manuscript, and preparation of the figures and tables. JA, DK, LaBB, GC, VJ, TDC, CRC, EAB, and MRK contributed to the study design, data interpretation, and writing of the manuscript. JK, MA, FM, YM, AO, NS, WO, LiBB, CM, TDR, CSC, and DB contributed to data collection, data interpretation, and writing of the manuscript. JFR was a member of the study's scientific advisory board. JP contributed to data analysis, data interpretation, preparation of the figures and tables, and writing of the manuscript. KZ and MG contributed to the analysis and interpretation of the tenofovir hair concentrations and contributed to the writing of the manuscript.
